Name: Marionette lab
About the game: A third-person action game with a fixed camera and elements of survival horror. Classic gameplay elements: limited inventory, lack of ammo, locked doors, endless chest, etc. The game has a fixed camera, but the controls are like in a top-down / twin-stick shooter. Explore the underground complex and find a way to the surface.
